amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the appraisal language in the bill and replace it with standard appraisal provisions used in federal land exchanges.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 112-660 to strike the unusual appraisal language from H.R. 5544 and replace it with standard appraisal provisions used in federal land exchanges.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 223 (Roll no. 566).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 223 (Roll no. 566).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
